name: Rookie
description:
Rookie is a 3D third-person puzzle platformer about a creature using baseball items to traverse their world. Players use logic and simple geometry puzzles to progress in the world, learning a bit more about where they are and who they are.

Kylie Gilde: UI design, shaders, and general gameplay programming

Matt Mercer: 3D modeling, level design, and enemy AI

Mylo Gonzalez: Level design, enemy AI, and general gameplay programming
